docs.summary: An object for retrieving conversion rates and converting amounts.
description: Use the currency converter to get currency conversion rates for any pair of supported currencies.
The rates are set once a day and the timestamp for each rate is returned together with the conversion rate.
You can also convert an array of amounts from one currency to another.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - The converted amounts and the timestamp for the conversion rate.

docs.summary: Converts an array of amounts from one currency to another.
description: Use the `convertAmounts()` function to convert an amount or an array of amounts between two currencies.
The `convertAmounts()` function returns a Promise that resolves to an array of converted amounts and the timestamp for the conversion rate used.

examples.title: Convert an array of amounts from one currency to another.

notes:
The currency codes used must exist in the array returned by the 
[`getAllCurrencies()`](#getAllCurrencies) function.

The currency codes used must exist in the array returned by the 
[`getAllCurrencies()`](#getAllCurrencies) function.

ret.doc:
Fulfilled - The conversion rate between the source and target currencies and 
the timestamp when the rate was set.

description: The `getConversionRate()` function returns a Promise that resolves to a currency conversion rate for converting between
two currencies. The exchange rates are provided by [XE](https://www.xe.com/company/) on a daily basis and include the timestamp when they were set.

examples.title: Return the conversion rate and timestamp.

notes: By using this function you agree to XE's [Terms of Use.](https://www.xe.com/en/legal/dfs.php)

docs.summary: An object representing a currency conversion rate.

members.name: rate
members.doc: The conversion rate from the source to target currencies.

members.name: timestamp
members.doc: The date and time when the rate was set.

docs.summary: An object representing the currencies and amounts to be converted.

members.name: from
members.doc: Currency to convert from.  The `from` currency code used must exist in the array returned by the [`getAllCurrencies()`](#getAllCurrencies) function.

members.name: to
members.doc: Currency to convert to. The `to` currency code used must exist in the array returned by the [`getAllCurrencies()`](#getAllCurrencies) function.

notes:
The `from` and `to` currency codes used must exist in the array returned by the 
[`getAllCurrencies()`](#getAllCurrencies) function.

docs.summary: An object representing the results of a currency conversion.

members.name: timestamp
members.doc: The date and time when the currency exchange rate was set.
